title: Police open fire at hijacked car in Kotahena
byline: Police opened fire at a car that was fleeing after being hijacked in Kotahena last night.

title: Navy intercepts local fishing trawler smuggling over 100 kgs of Ice, heroin
byline: Six suspects were arrested with 77 kilograms and 484 grams of heroin and 42 kilograms and 334 grams of Methamphetamine (Ice) during a special operation on the high seas by the Sri Lanka Navy.

title: Thundershowers expected in parts of the country: Met Department
byline: Showers or thundershowers are expected at a few places in the Central, Sabaragamuwa, Western, Southern, and Uva Provinces, as well as in the Ampara and Batticaloa districts during the afternoon or night, the Forecasting Division of the National Meteorological Centre said.

title: Herbal bath marks farewell to the old year
byline: In a deeply symbolic tradition observed across the country, communities gathered today (April 13), to perform the customary Ritual Bath for the Old Year, marking the end of one cycle and preparing to welcome the new.

title: SriLankan cabin crew begin ’work to rule’ over meal allowance
byline: The SriLankan Airlines Cabin Crew Members Association has launched a ’work to rule’ campaign, citing several demands, including the reallocation of their onboard meal allowance.
